DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety ESBA1008 versus EYLEA® treatment exudative age-related macular degeneration .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study ESBA1008 Versus EYLEA®
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist 16 visit ( Screening , Baseline [ Day 0 ] , 14 post-baseline assessment visit ) occur 4-week interval Week 56 . Enrolled subject randomize 1:1 receive ESBA1008 EYLEA . All subject receive active intravitreal ( IVT ) injection baseline 2 additional loading dos assign investigational product 4-week interval ( ie , Weeks 4 8 ) receive injection 8-weeks interval Weeks 16 , 24 , 32 . Subjects ESBA1008 group also receive injection Week 44 , subject EYLEA group also receive injection Weeks 40 48 . To maintain study masking , subject ESBA1008 group receive sham injection Weeks 40 48 ( subject EYLEA group receive active injection ) , subject EYLEA group receive sham injection Week 44 ( subject ESBA1008 group receive active injection ) . All subject follow Week 56 . Week 40 visit end assessment period 8-week treatment cycle .
